scripts.migrate:dry-run: cd scripts && npm install && node migrate-properties-to-zoos.js --dry-run
scripts.migrate:run: cd scripts && npm install && node migrate-properties-to-zoos.js
scripts.migrate:rollback: cd scripts && npm install && node rollback-migration.js --confirm
scripts.migrate:images:dry-run: cd scripts && npm install && node migrate-images.js --dry-run
scripts.migrate:images:run: cd scripts && npm install && node migrate-images.js
scripts.optimize:images: cd scripts && npm install && node optimize-images.js
